f:I[63327,["/_next/static/chunks/2fd32df42ef26f8b.js","/_next/static/chunks/f501513783488158.js"],"default"]
10:T1458,<h1 class="text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-4 mt-8">Features Overview</h1>
<h2 class="text-2xl font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-3 mt-8">Repository Management</h2>
Browse and manage Docker repositories with an intuitive interface:

<img src="/img/docker-registry-ui/repositories.png" alt="Repository Management Interface" class="rounded-lg border border-gray-200 my-6" />

<strong class="text-gray-900">Repository List</strong>: View all repositories in your registry
<strong class="text-gray-900">Search</strong>: Quickly find repositories by name
<strong class="text-gray-900">Tags View</strong>: See all tags for each repository
<strong class="text-gray-900">Tag Details</strong>: View manifest, layers, and metadata
<strong class="text-gray-900">Delete Tags</strong>: Remove individual tags (when not in read-only mode)
<h2 class="text-2xl font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-3 mt-8">Multi-Registry Support</h2>
Manage multiple Docker registries from a single interface:

<img src="/img/docker-registry-ui/registry-configuration-for-multi-registry-support.png" alt="Multi-Registry Configuration" class="rounded-lg border border-gray-200 my-6" />

Switch between registries using the dropdown selector
Support for local and remote registries
Basic authentication support
Independent configuration per registry
<h2 class="text-2xl font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-3 mt-8">Image Information</h2>
Detailed information about each image tag:


<strong class="text-gray-900">Size</strong>: Total image size
<strong class="text-gray-900">Created</strong>: Image creation timestamp
<strong class="text-gray-900">Digest</strong>: SHA256 digest for verification
<strong class="text-gray-900">Architecture</strong>: Platform architecture (amd64, arm64, etc.)
<strong class="text-gray-900">OS</strong>: Operating system
<strong class="text-gray-900">Layers</strong>: Layer-by-layer breakdown with sizes
<h2 class="text-2xl font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-3 mt-8">Layer Inspection</h2>
View detailed layer information:

<img src="/img/docker-registry-ui/layer-inspection.png" alt="Layer Inspection View" class="rounded-lg border border-gray-200 my-6" />

Layer digest and size
Command that created the layer
Vulnerability count per layer
Layer order and hierarchy
<h2 class="text-2xl font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-3 mt-8">Vulnerability Scanning</h2>
Built-in Trivy integration for security scanning:

<img src="/img/docker-registry-ui/cves.png" alt="Vulnerability Scanning with CVE Details" class="rounded-lg border border-gray-200 my-6" />

<strong class="text-gray-900">On-Demand Scanning</strong>: Scan any image tag
<strong class="text-gray-900">Severity Levels</strong>: Critical, High, Medium, Low, Unknown
<strong class="text-gray-900">CVE Details</strong>: View detailed vulnerability information
<strong class="text-gray-900">NVD Links</strong>: Direct links to National Vulnerability Database
<strong class="text-gray-900">Layer Attribution</strong>: See which layer introduced each vulnerability
<strong class="text-gray-900">Persistent Results</strong>: Scan results saved for future reference
<h2 class="text-2xl font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-3 mt-8">Bulk Operations</h2>
Efficiently manage multiple images:


<strong class="text-gray-900">Pattern Matching</strong>: Delete tags matching wildcards (e.g., <code class="px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded bg-gray-100 text-gray-800 text-sm font-mono">dev-*</code>)
<strong class="text-gray-900">Age-Based Cleanup</strong>: Remove tags older than specified days
<strong class="text-gray-900">Retention Policies</strong>: Keep minimum number of recent tags
<strong class="text-gray-900">Dry Run Mode</strong>: Preview deletions before executing
<strong class="text-gray-900">Batch Processing</strong>: Delete multiple tags in one operation
<h2 class="text-2xl font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-3 mt-8">Read/Write Modes</h2>
Control access levels:


<strong class="text-gray-900">Read-Only Mode</strong>: Browse and scan without modification
<strong class="text-gray-900">Read-Write Mode</strong>: Full access including delete operations
Toggle via environment variable or UI
Ideal for production environments
<h2 class="text-2xl font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-3 mt-8">User Interface</h2>
Modern, responsive design:


Clean, intuitive layout inspired by Jira/Bitbucket
Responsive design for mobile and desktop
Dark mode support
Fast, client-side rendering
Real-time updates
<h2 class="text-2xl font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-3 mt-8">API Integration</h2>
Full Docker Registry v2 API support:


List repositories and tags
Get image manifests
Delete images by digest
CORS support for browser access
<h2 class="text-2xl font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-3 mt-8">Storage Analytics</h2>
Understand registry storage usage:

<img src="/img/docker-registry-ui/analytics-understand-disk-usage.png" alt="Storage Analytics Dashboard" class="rounded-lg border border-gray-200 my-6" />

Total repository size
Per-tag storage breakdown
Layer deduplication visibility
Storage trends over time
<h2 class="text-2xl font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-3 mt-8">Search and Filter</h2>
Find what you need quickly:


Repository name search
Tag filtering
Vulnerability severity filtering
Sort by name, date, or size6:["$","div",null,{"className":"flex min-h-[calc(100vh-4rem)]","children":[["$","$Lf",null,{"groups":[{"title":"Getting Started","items":[{"id":"getting-started","title":"Installation","slug":"getting-started"},{"id":"configuration","title":"Configuration","slug":"configuration"}]},{"title":"Features","items":[{"id":"features","title":"Overview","slug":"features"},{"id":"security","title":"Security Scanning","slug":"security"},{"id":"bulk-operations","title":"Bulk Operations","slug":"bulk-operations"}]},{"title":"Examples","items":[{"id":"multi-registry","title":"Multi-Registry Setup","slug":"examples/multi-registry"},{"id":"basic-auth","title":"Basic Auth Registry","slug":"examples/basic-auth"}]},{"title":"Reference","items":[{"id":"api","title":"API Integration","slug":"api"},{"id":"development","title":"Development","slug":"development"},{"id":"testing","title":"Testing Guide","slug":"testing"}]}],"basePath":"/docker-registry-ui","title":"$undefined"}],["$","main",null,{"className":"flex-1 min-w-0","children":["$","div",null,{"className":"mx-auto max-w-4xl px-6 py-8","children":[["$","div",null,{"className":"mb-8","children":["$","$L5",null,{"href":"/docker-registry-ui","className":"text-sm text-gray-500 hover:text-gray-700 flex items-center gap-1","children":"← Back to Docker Registry UI"}]}],["$","article",null,{"className":"prose max-w-none","children":[["$","h1",null,{"className":"text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-2","children":"Features"}],["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-600 text-lg mb-8","children":"Features for Docker Registry UI"}],["$","div",null,{"className":"prose max-w-none","dangerouslySetInnerHTML":{"__html":"$10"}}]]}]]}]}]]}]
b:[["$","meta","0",{"charSet":"utf-8"}],["$","meta","1",{"name":"viewport","content":"width=device-width, initial-scale=1"}]]
